In simple terms, they make sure that websites respond even if there’s a lot of users. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"11.0pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-ascii-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\",\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Yu Mincho\\\"\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-fareast\",\"mso-hansi-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"Arial\",\"mso-bidi-theme-font\":\"minor-bidi\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Performance is one of the key characteristics of high-quality software: the convenience and beauty of a website, online store assortment, game graphics and plot will not be appreciated if the product is slow or does not work at all. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"11.0pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-ascii-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\",\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Yu Mincho\\\"\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-fareast\",\"mso-hansi-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"Arial\",\"mso-bidi-theme-font\":\"minor-bidi\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Sometimes performance testing and performance analysis (optimization) differentiate. Performance testing task is only to measure how the system works and give this data to a specialist who will study why it does not work the way it should. In the second case the task is not only to measure, but also to figure out why it works slowly, or at least help to do it. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"11.0pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-ascii-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\",\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Yu Mincho\\\"\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-fareast\",\"mso-hansi-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"Arial\",\"mso-bidi-theme-font\":\"minor-bidi\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As a rule, performance testing skills are enough for beginners in Performance Engineer profession. Further development of the performance analyst assumes the ability to independently find problem areas in the system. The main qualities of performance engineers are analytical thinking and the ability to draw conclusions from facts. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"11.0pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-ascii-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\",\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Yu
